tumour_normal_designation.name: tumour_normal_designation
tumour_normal_designation.description: Description of specimen tumour/normal status for data processing

biospecimen_anatomic_location.name: biospecimen_anatomic_location
biospecimen_anatomic_location.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic location of a biospecimen when it was collected

meta.notes: Refer to guidelines in the ICD-O-3 manual: ICD-O-3 manual at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344

tumour_histological_type.name: tumour_histological_type
tumour_histological_type.description: The code to represent the histology (morphology) of neoplasms that is usually obtained from a pathology report, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3)

meta.notes: If biospecimen is a tumour, Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344

tumor_normal_designation.name: tumor_normal_designation
tumor_normal_designation.description: Description of specimen tumor/normal status for data processing

meta.notes: Indicate `Not applicable' if the biospecimen was not analysed.

biospecimen_anatomic_location_source_tex.name: biospecimen_anatomic_location_source_text
biospecimen_anatomic_location_source_tex.description: Indicate the anatomic location where the biospecimen was collected

meta.notes: Use the term that was used when collecting the biospecimen

biospecimen_anatomic_location_SNOMED_cod.name: biospecimen_anatomic_location_SNOMED_code
biospecimen_anatomic_location_SNOMED_cod.description: Indicate the SNOMED CT notation (code) for the anatomic location of the biospecimen

tumor_histological_type.name: tumor_histological_type
tumor_histological_type.description: The code to represent the histology (morphology) of neoplasms that is usually obtained from a pathology report, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3)

meta.notes: If biospecimen is a tumor, Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344

description.left: Stage group of the tumor, as assigned by the reporting tumor_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumor stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.)
description.right: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.)

notes.left: This field is dependent on the selected tumor_staging_system
notes.right: This field is dependent on the selected tumour_staging_system

description.left: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumor (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual
description.right: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual

notes.left: This field is required only if the selected tumor_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.
notes.right: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.
